result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Lee Davis

records.addlTxt: Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for LEVEL 5 SUPERVISION. No contact with the victims.
Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court, in custody.  Attorney Morgan L. Minter in court for Robert Lee Davis.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin.
Bail/bond hearing held. Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court. Court sets a $5,000.00 signature bond.  State intends to file a joinder motion. Case is adjourned for a hearing on the joinder motion in Branch 36.
Motion hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Received and Filed: Hart Powell S.C.
Signed and filed: Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense (No Reimbursement)
Received and Filed.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis appeared by video.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Minter appears as friend of the court.

Case in court for a status conference.  No attorney appointed.  Defendant does not wish to waive speedy trial demand.  Speedy demand expires on October 11, 2022.  State informs the court that new charges have been filed (22CF3512).  Court orders continuance and vacated jury trial previously scheduled.  Court appoints Hart Powell S.C., at County expense on all 4 pending cases (21CF4199, 22CF1164, 22CF1166, and 22CF3512).  Due to a finding of indigency, reimbursement by the defendant is not required.  Court scheduled a status conference/bail-bond hearing.  Case adjourned to Branch 36, Rm 316 SB.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Motion for Appointment of Counsel.  (Robert L. Davis, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Robert L. Davis, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status of counsel. No counsel appointed. Defendant unwilling to waive speedy trial demand. Court is advised of new charges pending. Case adjourned to branch 36.
Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Michael Hart appears as a friend of the court. Attorney Hart is checking with his firm to determine if they can be appointed to represent the defendant. Case is adjourned in Branch 36.
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Robert L. Davis - #229276, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Robert Lee Davis in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for an arraignment.  No information filed.  Defense's motion to withdraw as counsel GRANTED by the court.  Court scheduled a status of counsel date.  Public Defender's Office notified of next court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 36.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Notice of Motion and Motion to Dismiss Legal Counsel from Defendant ( Robert Davis 8885 S 68th Street Franklin, Wi 53132)
Motion and Notice of Motion for Speedy Trial from Defendant ( Robert Davis House of Correction 8885 S68 th St Franklin, WI 53132)

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court with Attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Robert Lee Davis in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for an Arraignment. Defendant wishes for new counsel. Court will not grant defense motion to withdraw until new counsel has been appointed. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Arraignment scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court with Attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Robert Lee Davis in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Sgt. B. LaRoque.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. State requests an arraignment date. Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  Arraignment scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 08:15 am.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Received and filed

Defendant Robert Lee Davis not in court, defendant in custody.  Gregg Herman appears in person the State of Wisconsin
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Attorny Jude fail to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis not in court, defendant in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Attorney Jude is in another court unable to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsinn, via zoom.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM AND LIVE STREAM ON DA CAST. Case set for Preliminary hearing. Attorney Michael Jude unavailable for today's hearing. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Michael Jude; filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Robert Lee Davis in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Robert Lee Davis in custody.  Matthew James Torbenson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert Lee Davis appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
